程序包 main.com.ae2dms

类 GameEngine

java.lang.Object
main.com.ae2dms.GameEngine
public class GameEngine
extends java.lang.Object
The GameEngine class contains several methods and fields for game running.

First part is about control the movements of game objects. Methods move(Point), handleKey(KeyCode), undo() etc are responsible for controlling the move and count the steps in each level.

The second part is about game level control.Methods getNextLevel(),resetCurrentLevel(InputStream), getCurrentLevel() are responsible to reset and switch between the levels.

The third part is about game file management. Methods saveGame(File),loadGameFile(InputStream) are responsible for saving and loading the game file.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • GameEngine

      public GameEngine​(java.io.InputStream input)
      Initialize the game engine.Components to be initialized includes the followings
      • initialize the GameLogger GameLogger to log info
      • load the game file loadGameFile(InputStream)
      • get the start level getNextLevel()
      参数:
      input - input stream of the game file

  • 方法详细资料

    • isDebugActive

      public static boolean isDebugActive()
      return the debug state of the gameEngine.
      返回:
      return a boolean value,true if gameEngine is in debug mode, false if not

    • handleKey

      public void handleKey​(javafx.scene.input.KeyCode code)
      Handle the keyboard input to control the keeper. The method uses a predefined factory MovementFactory which contains a hashmap of keycode-point map set to get the corresponding movement of the keyboard input. If the keycode is predefined, the movement direction will be returned. Otherwise, the factory method will return a Point with zero values for both x and y. The keeper will remain in the same place.
      参数:
      code - keyboard input.
      另请参阅:
      GameRunningController.reloadGrid(), MovementFactory

    • move

      private void move​(java.awt.Point delta)
      This function will move keeper. The actual function to handle movement is isKeeperMoved(Point, Point, GameObject), where the function breaks down the situation for movements into three parts, in front of crate, in front of wall and in fron of nothing(floor). If the keeper is moved(KeeperMoved is true), this method will store the returnMove(the opposite direction of delta), add the move count for current level or add currentLeveMoveCount to totalMoveCount and get next level if the game is complete.
      参数:
      delta - the direction of the move.

    • isKeeperMoved

      private boolean isKeeperMoved​(java.awt.Point delta, java.awt.Point targetObjectPoint, GameObject target)
      The method moves the keeper. It will return true if keeper is moved,false if not. Case that keeper will not move is that the destination point is a wall. If the keeper moves the crate, the flag crateMoved will be true also.
      参数:
      delta - the move of the object
      targetObjectPoint - the position of the keeper
      target - the target at the destination
      返回:
      return true if keeper moved, false if not
      另请参阅:
      moveObject(Point, Point, GameObject)

    • moveObject

      private void moveObject​(java.awt.Point delta, java.awt.Point ObjectPoint, GameObject object)
      switch the position of the object and the position of target object
      参数:
      delta - the move of the object
      ObjectPoint - current position of the object to be moved
      object - the object to be moved

    • undo

      public void undo()
      This method will undo the last move of the keeper. If only keeper moved in the last move, keeper will go back to its previous position and the steps count currentLevelMoveCount will decrease. If crate also moved in the last move, crate will go back to its previous position. The method can only undo the latest move, it doesn't stores a series of history moves.

    • printDebugInfo

      public void printDebugInfo​(java.awt.Point delta)
      print the debug info, including the state of the level, layout of the level, position of the keeper and the position of the target object.
      参数:
      delta - move direction

    • saveGame

      public void saveGame​(java.io.File savedFile) throws java.io.IOException
      Save the counts number and the layout of the levels starting from the current level to the end of the Level list to a file. First write the map set name, totalMoveCount and CurrentLevelMoveCount to the beginning of the file. After that, iterate all the levels starting from the current to the end of the Level list levels and write the layouts of the walls, crates, diamonds and keeper to the file.
      参数:
      savedFile - the file that the data is write to
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if file not found or error saving

    • loadGameFile

      private java.util.List<Level> loadGameFile​(java.io.InputStream input)
      The method loads the game file and save the records of total move count and current level count if the game file contains these data. The method uses a BufferedReader to read the game file line by line.
      • If the line contains "MapSetName: " the string after the identifier will be stored as the map set name
      • If the line contains "TotalMoveCount: " the string after the identifier will be converted into int and saved as totalMoveCount
      • If the line contains "CurrentLevelMoveCount:" the string after the identifier will be converted into int and saved as currentLevelMoveCount
      • If the line contains "LevelName: " the string after the identifier will be stored as the level name
      • If the line has regular expression that contains enum types of GameObject, the line will be added to a string Level
      • If the line is null, instantiate a level object with levelName, levelIndex and string level
      参数:
      input - input stream of game file
      返回:
      returns a list containing all the levels
      另请参阅:
      Level

    • getNextLevel

      public Level getNextLevel()
      If the method is called in GameEngine(InputStream) constructor, it will return the first level in the list by default since there are no levels currently running. If the method is called in move(Point)锛宨t is the case that current level is completed and the method will get the next level through index in the level list. If all the levels in the level list is used, then it indicates the game is completed. GameRunningController.reloadGrid() will exam whether the game is completed and it will start game-end scene if the game is completed.
      返回:
      return a level object

    • resetCurrentLevel

      public void resetCurrentLevel​(java.io.InputStream input)
      The method resets the current level that the user is playing. It first stores the index of the current level in the Level list. Then reload the game file and get the reset level through (index-1) since the index of the list starts from 0. Set the currentLevelMoveCount to 0 since the level is loaded and the previous move steps for the reset level will not be counted.
      参数:
      input - input stream of the game file

    • toggleDebug

      public void toggleDebug()
      set the GameEngine debug state to the opposite one. The GameEngine only has two states, debug = true or debug = false

    • saveCurrentLevelRecord

      private void saveCurrentLevelRecord() throws java.io.IOException
      Save the move count of the current level to a temporary file. It will create a temp file if there doesn't exists one. The file is located in /resources/records folder.
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - if save record to file fails

    • skipLevel

      public void skipLevel()
      The method used for skipping the current level. It is called by GameRunningController.setEventFilter(). When using press 'ctrl + z', the method will be called and allow the user pass the current level with a one step cost.

    • translatePoint

      static java.awt.Point translatePoint​(java.awt.Point sourceLocation, java.awt.Point delta)
      Calculate the move of Point class.The method get two point classes as parameters. The first one is the current position of the object, the second one is the delta which the object will move. The return of the method is the destination point of the object after move.
      参数:
      sourceLocation - the current location of the object
      delta - the direction where the object will move
      返回:
      return the destination of the object
      另请参阅:
      Point.translate(int, int)

    • isGameComplete

      public boolean isGameComplete()
      return true if game completed, false if not
      返回:
      true if game completed, false if not

    • getCurrentLevel

      public Level getCurrentLevel()
      return the current level pointer
      返回:
      the current level

    • setCurrentLevel

      public void setCurrentLevel​(Level targetLevel)
      Set the current level to the input level.
      参数:
      targetLevel - the input level

    • getMapSetName

      public java.lang.String getMapSetName()
      return the map set name
      返回:
      the map set name

    • getCurrentLevelMoveCount

      public int getCurrentLevelMoveCount()
      return current level move count
      返回:
      return the current level move count

    • getTotalMoveCount

      public int getTotalMoveCount()
      return the total move count
      返回:
      the total move count starts from the beginning

    • isPuppetMode

      public boolean isPuppetMode()
      return true if game is in puppet mode
      返回:
      true if game is in puppet mode, false otherwise.

    • setPuppetMode

      public void setPuppetMode​(boolean puppetMode)
      set the bool value of puppetMode
      参数:
      puppetMode - boolean value to set puppetMode flag variable

    • isThroughWallMode

      public boolean isThroughWallMode()
      return true if in through-wall mode, false if not.
      返回:
      true if in through-wall mode, false if not

    • setThroughWallMode

      public void setThroughWallMode​(boolean throughWallMode)
      set the through-wall mode
      参数:
      throughWallMode - boolean value to set the flag variable

    • isPause

      public boolean isPause()
      return ture if game is paused,false otherwise
      返回:
      ture if game is paused, false otherwise

    • setPause

      public void setPause​(boolean pause)
      set pause flag variable
      参数:
      pause - boolean value to set the flag variable
